fullText: This likable little musical about the perils of modern romance has a sweetly old-fashioned sensibility that should appeal to audiences looking for something light and cheery.
dtliExcerpt: This likable little musical about the perils of modern romance has a sweetly old-fashioned sensibility that should appeal to audiences looking for something light and cheery.
